issue.title: putlocker.best
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://putlocker.best/putlocker/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fputlocker.best%2Fputlocker%2F) ### Comment > every time i get on this site its always a popup ad for porn > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/fld50jpvadc0cs48o0sogso4scwggk89xgm0h4i7k0.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.800.44 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Filters last update: | January 24, 2026 at 21:00 ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.2.800.44&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=3&browser=chrome&filters=2.10&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&filters_last_update=2026-01-24T21%3A00%3A28)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: nypost.com
issue.body:
